extendedInfo.description: Document & eBook reader for iSilo, Palm Doc, and plain text files. 1000s of readily downloadable eBooks, reference, non-fiction/fictional works, or create your own. Powerful file organization, configurability, clipboard copy, annotations, & more.Bonus:CIA World Factbook free, optimized, see websiteSUMMER SALE: 40% off normal price of $19.99

reviews.title: Works, but OUTDATED and NOT user friendly at all!!
reviews.comment: There is the need for a user friendly way to highlight. There is no underlining. Highlighting and annotations should be added to the document NOT to another document that cannot EVER be opened or moved. Please update the app and make it user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: I am grateful that we have this app. To do the things we need to. So I gave it 4 stars . I would love to give it 5 stars though when more updates are added. Thanks for this app.
reviews.author: Raymond Freitas

reviews.title: Did not work!!!!!
reviews.comment: Awful
reviews.author: Carol Hawkins

reviews.title: Meh...poorly implemented
reviews.comment: Scrolling is choppy, has an ugly UI, text cannot be zoomed easily, poor navigation...An expensive and ugly port of an old program. They should rewrite the interface to match modern touch readers. This still looks like it did on my iPaq.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super slow on galaxy S4
reviews.comment: It\'s barely usable on the s4. It\'s so annoyingly slow.   It\'s just sad how we\'re locked into using this app to open our documents. And its just sad how the developer doesn\'t care about improving this software because they know people who need it are going to buy it anyway.
reviews.author: Lemuel Cantos

reviews.title: Needs Development!
reviews.comment: This is pretty much one of the least refined Apps I\'ve ever downloaded, let alone paid money for. It feels like the developer is relying solely on the fact that some users need SOMETHING to read iSilo files. This is the most expensive App I\'ve ever bought for android and it\'s also the worst performing. If there was ANY alternative, I would take it.
reviews.author: Dominik Azam

reviews.comment: Although if works... it is SO OUTDATED and has very FEW options for annotations, no underline feature and dark colors.  Not worth the money to they improve it.
reviews.author: Mimi Snyder

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: All of a sudden....nothing! Tried everything.....Nada.  Too bad I use this all the time.
reviews.author: Robert Barcus

reviews.title: Need more font size options
reviews.comment: The font looks way too small on the high resolution devices (1080p - Galaxy S4) even when set to largest setting.
reviews.author: Jackie Weng

reviews.title: Outdated UI
reviews.comment: The only programme which can read pdb file. Wish that developer can update this UI to match modern day demand. I\'ve been using iSilo since Palm days and sad to see this being stagnant.
reviews.author: Jiao Teh

reviews.title: Lags and choppy scrolling
reviews.comment: This app needs an update and a complete ui overhaul. I really hate that it lags and when scrolling it gets really choppy. Please update please considering the app cost so much. The iOS version is very smooth.
reviews.author: Daniel Kim

reviews.title: Use it all the time with pdb files
reviews.comment: The 2013 update vastly improved the app. Had quite a few problems with original. Had to re buy the new version as it would not run after update. But it is more than worth it to do so.  Could not do without it. Use on Galaxy Tab. No longer have problems finding new files downloaded. I would not be without the iSilo program and it is the only program i allow automatic update. Have increased the space available and run many files. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same as it was 6 years ago
reviews.comment: The Android version is so laggy compared to the iOS version, but that can be lived with. But now phones are coming out with high resolution and the text (even resized) is so small you can\'t read it at all.
reviews.author: Regan Ryan

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: You guys shld do a major overhaul on this app. Moon reader is killing u
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does the job, not purdy but nothing does it better.
reviews.comment: Would be worth the price if they added a better UI options. Annotations that worked well would be nice, highlighted area with sub notes, better search options. But no app handles large text databases better and quicker. Just wish it had some bells for the price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Improve your app please
reviews.comment: Laggy as usual. Only a few changes over the past decate! Come on it is time to improve
reviews.author: Mark Keunsuk Lee

reviews.title: Time for a Major Overhaul.
reviews.comment: This app needs a major overhaul. Scrolling is jumpy and many times does not respond to touch. Annotations are a major disappointment.  For this price any user expects a better experience. Get back to Coding Developer.
reviews.author: J. Acevedo

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: It cracks everytime when I long press screen to copy. Please fix it!
reviews.author: James Cheng

reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Jeana Jeffers

reviews.title: Expensive
reviews.comment: Ive been using this app since palm days. Its very indispensable especially reading my good old ebooks. Too bad it became more expensive in android system. Nevertheless, its useful.
reviews.author: winlyn palumar
